item.title: Unit 8
item.description: Quick Reference Mapping rule: $(x, y) \rightarrow (\frac{x}{b}+h)(ay+k)$ Transformations for a function: $y=af(b(x-h))+k$ (or $y=af(k(x-h))+c$ ) Transformations: For this equation, $y=af(b(x-h))+k$ : Vertical Scaling (using $a$) If $|a| > 1$: vs by $|a|$. Else if $0 < |a| < 1$: vc by $|a|$. Vertical Reflection (using $a$) If $a < 0$: reflect on x-axis. Horizontal Scaling (using $b$) If $|b| > 1$: hs by $\frac{1}{|b|}$.
